@author: uidq3472

class excelaccess.libwrappers.excel_file_reader.ExcelFileReader(cfg_xml=None)[source]¶

Class for reading an Excel file based on the provided XML configuration file.

Parameters:cfg_xml (str or None) – a (relative) path to Config XML (if not provided via command line arguments)

For testing purposes. Actual functionality lies in ExcelFileReader-class below this function.

excelaccess.libwrappers.xlrd_xlwt_wrapper module¶

@author: uidq3472

http://xlrd.readthedocs.io/en/latest/ https://xlwt.readthedocs.io/en/latest/ http://xlutils.readthedocs.io/en/latest/

-> ATTENTION to indexing: most of the time has to be decremented by 1 before use
due to the aligning to xlwings which is 1 indexed instead of zero indexed
class excelaccess.libwrappers.xlrd_xlwt_wrapper.ExcelFileObject(cfg_xml_path)[source]¶

Bases: excelaccess.libwrappers._excel_library_wrapper.ExcelLibraryWrapper

ExcelFileObject for xlrd/xlwt libraries.

Parameters:cfg_xml_path (str) – a (relative) path to a Config XML file
close()[source]¶
Raises:NotImplementedError – method not yet implemented
create_header_tree(sheet_obj, header_col_range, header_row_range, header_merged_cells, parent=None)[source]¶

Returns a tree structure of the header fields in the specified ranges of the provided sheet.

Parameters:
  • sheet_obj (xlrd.sheet) – Excel sheet to operate on
  • header_col_range (list(int)) – the range of columns of the header
  • header_row_range (list(int)) – the range of rows of the header
  • header_merged_cells (lsit(MergedCell)) – list of merged cells in the header area
  • parent (TreeNode or None) – parent node
Returns:

tree of headers
Return type:

TreeNode
